member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.WebSockets.Protocol.HandshakeHelpers.NeededHeaders
member.summary: Gets request headers needed process the handshake on the server.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebSockets.Protocol.HandshakeHelpers.IsRequestKeyValid(System.String)
member.summary: Validates the Sec-WebSocket-Key request header "The value of this header field MUST be a nonce consisting of a randomly selected 16-byte value that has been base64-encoded."

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebSockets.Protocol.HandshakeHelpers.CreateRequestKey
member.summary: "The value of this header field MUST be a nonce consisting of a randomly selected 16-byte value that has been base64-encoded."

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.WebSockets.Protocol.HandshakeHelpers.CreateResponseKey(System.String)
member.summary: "...the base64-encoded SHA-1 of the concatenation of the |Sec-WebSocket-Key| (as a string, not base64-decoded) with the string '258EAFA5-E914-47DA-95CA-C5AB0DC85B11'"
